channel.title: work from home on Mya Pitzeruse
channel.description: Recent content in work from home on Mya Pitzeruse

item.title: Show us Your Setup!
item.description: Indeed had an internal blog series called “Show us Your Setup.” It was a great way to get an idea of others workspaces, the equipment they use, and software they run. Recently, I had noticed a few folks doing a walk through of their equipment. In this post, I will show and walk through my setup. I’ll discuss the things I like, and the things I don’t.
